text:
@SenatorCollins if you had allowed the impeachment we would not have covid19.. so complain to some one else
i hope your state goes bankrupt
that many many of your citizens die from covid cursing you.
i hope you are haunted in hell over your decision to not impeach and to kiss rumps ass.
